Stealth - REMOTE - Full-Time - Founding Senior Flutter Engineer, Founding Designer (European time zones)

We’re a remote-first startup building AI-powered, non-gaming, consumer mobile apps. Our team includes ex Palantir and Meta engineers, and we're looking for a Founding Flutter Engineer & a Founding Designer to join us in shaping the future of AI-driven products.

What we’re looking for:

  • Founding Senior Flutter Engineer: you'll lead the development of our mobile applications, working closely with our AI team to create compelling user experiences. You'll be responsible for building scalable architectures and establishing technical standards across our app portfolio.

  • Founding Designer: you'll primarily own the product design and UI/UX for our consumer mobile apps, with some lightweight support for marketing and brand design needs. You'll rapidly bring design concepts from ideation to production, working closely with the rest of our team to create compelling user experiences that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities.

More details and how to apply:

  • https://tinyurl.com/founding-flutter-engineer
  • https://tinyurl.com/stealth-founding-designer

Please note: NO agencies, outsourcing, outstaffing, or business development representatives should reach out.
